Regarding Teetee
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Regarding Teetee
By GM on Saturday, March 22, 2008 - 05:32 pm:

For some strange reason, I've never, ever faced her in a tournament. Has anyone ever battled her in the Official E?

I'm currently attempting to type up the game's script, and for some reason she hasn't shown up in either the summer or autumn tourneys.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 22, 2008 - 07:48 pm:

I recall facing her at least once. IIRC, and it's been a while, she always appeared when I was trying to get to a new rank and could just barely squeak through it to win.

By GM on Saturday, March 22, 2008 - 08:14 pm:

Ah, was this when you first started? Or after you beat the game?

I entered the first Official E that popped up, the summer one, with the starting Garu. She wasn't there. She wasn't in the next one, either. I've kept the save separate, so I can keep on trying 'till I face her.

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, March 23, 2008 - 11:15 am:

It was on my first time through.

By GM on Sunday, March 23, 2008 - 01:35 pm:

I guess I'll keep resetting 'till she appears.

If it isn't a bother, would anyone mind helping me out by starting a new game and entering the Official E? I really need the script.

By Salokin on Thursday, March 27, 2008 - 05:53 am:

She shows up with her Kelarino in the D rank tournoment. You have to face her but if your Garu has a strong accuracy it'll be no problem.

By Salokin on Thursday, March 27, 2008 - 05:55 am:

She will NOT appear in the E rank tournament so stop resetting. There's no use.

By GM on Thursday, March 27, 2008 - 08:09 am:

Thanks for the heads up. Yuri was misleading, she was.

Is there any possibility that Teetee won't appear in the Official D?

By Salokin on Thursday, March 27, 2008 - 10:16 am:

No she'll show up.

By GM on Thursday, March 27, 2008 - 10:45 am:

Smashing. Thanks much!
